recipesJson.name: Beachbreeze
recipesJson.author: J-Rizzle
recipesJson.description: This tropical delight took several revisions to tame, but the result is a strawberry / orange / mango blend with a lemon citrus accent that sets it off.  Better let this one sit for 4 days minimum, it just keeps getting better with age!  Mix at 70/30 VG/PG.  Enjoy.
